name: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Norwegian Paint Jobs Pack
detailed_description:
Customize your truck with your country flag! A choice of four unique paint jobs will come handy if you feel you need to show your affiliation...

  • Chieftain
  • Norwegian Fan Ribbon
  • Norwegian Flag Metallic
  • Norwegian Flag Decal

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.
about_the_game:

short_description: Customize your truck with your country flag! A choice of four unique paint jobs will come handy if you feel you need to show your affiliation... Chieftain Norwegian Fan Ribbon Norwegian Flag Metallic Norwegian Flag DecalAll of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.
supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 法语, 意大利语, 韩语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 俄语, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 波兰语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 挪威语, 瑞典语, 匈牙利语, 捷克语, 罗马尼亚语, 土耳其语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 保加利亚语, 希腊语

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class
  • DirectX®: 10
  • Hard Drive: 50 MB available space
  • Sound: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class
  • DirectX®: 10
  • Hard Drive: 50 MB available space
  • Sound: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8+ (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT-class equivalent
  • Hard Drive: 50 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.8+ (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class or better
  • Hard Drive: 50 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class
  • recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably with ETS2)
  • Hard Drive: 50 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 760-class
  • recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably with ETS2)
  • Hard Drive: 50 MB available space
